price: Ku tuna a lõkacin da kuke kaɗan, waɗanda ake raunanarwã a cikin ƙasa kunã tsõron mutãne su cafe ku, sai Ya tattara ku (a wurin natsuwa, Maɗina), kuma Ya ƙarfafã ku da taimakonSa kuma Ya azurtã ku daga abũbuwa mãsu dãɗi; Tsammãninku, kunã gõdẽwa.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ قَلِيلٞ مُّسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ فَـَٔاوَىٰكُمۡ وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
